title: Remove Paywalls from Search Results
author: #BlackLivesMatter
excerpt: “For the curious mind, there is more free content available on the internet than ever, and yet as internet users, we run into paywalls more…
text: “For the curious mind, there is more free content available on the internet than ever, and yet as internet users, we run into paywalls more often than ever before. So we built the FreeInternetPlugin.com to give people the option to choose what type of content is allowed and not allowed in their search results.”
html: “For the curious mind, there is more free content available on the internet than ever, and yet as internet users, we run into paywalls more often than ever before. So we built the FreeInternetPlugin.com to give people the option to choose what type of content is allowed and not allowed in their search results.”
